trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were 5 other sightings in Louisville on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsDuring a concert in downtown before the fireworks my wife pointed out a glowing red orb that was very high and stationary shortly after I took a lame picture of the event with my cell phone a small star looking light flew around the red orb. Shortly afterwards the red orb went straight up and disappeared
